programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: Just Like A Woman
programme.desc: Two women travel from Chicago to Santa Fe to escape their suffocating lives. Marilyn dreams of winning a contest held by a famous belly dancing company, while her friend, Mona, has a darker secret.

programme.title: A Summer in South Tyrol
programme.desc: When Franziska Gasser travels back to South Tyrol following her father’s car accident, sparks fly between her and Marco Antonelli. However, the long-standing rivalry between the Germans and Italians threatens to put an abrupt end to the blooming romance.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Silent Death
programme.desc: In a sealed factory with the highest security precautions, the destruction of deadly substances is underway. However, the lead chemist is kidnapped along with a canister of Sarin gas - an invisible and odourless poison that kills within minutes.

programme.title: Silenced Tree
programme.desc: Hayati is a small-town literature teacher and author who can’t move on from his past: his failing marriage, his sick mother, a decaying walnut tree, and memories of his father. When his wife’s body is found, the innocent Hayati confesses to the murder.

programme.title: Patchwork Family
programme.desc: Christian is a divorced father who can only see his young daughter Vanessa every other weekend. When he meets the single mother Christine and decides to participate in a summer TV show, his whole life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Staring into the Abyss
programme.desc: LKA officer David Wallat monitors released child murderer Joseph Maria Hagenow, now housed by a village pastor. As Hagenow manipulates his guards, a child’s disappearance threatens to unravel Wallat’s entire operation.

programme.title: Victoria Must Go
programme.desc: Hedvig and Henrik's new stepmother Victoria is annoying and constantly introducing new rules. They decide to hire a hitman to get rid of her, and end up persuading a very reluctant immigrant, Carl, to do the job.

programme.title: The Belt
programme.desc: When her friend goes away on a business trip, May’s encounter with her friend’s husband ignites her secret desire for him. She attempts to seduce him in their next meeting, so that she may test his faithfulness.

programme.title: Elaha
programme.desc: Elaha, a young Kurdish-German woman, battles patriarchy and family expectations while seeking her own path. Elaha struggles with traditions, marriage and virginity, and she must choose between emancipation or delusion.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: Murder In Tours
programme.desc: A controversial sculptor is found murdered beside one of his artworks, which has been vandalized with Latin inscriptions. Commander Louise works with her son Sylvain to decode the crime; the clues lead them to disturbing truths about the artist’s works.

programme.title: Lemonade
programme.desc: Mara, a young Romanian mother, is a caretaker in the US on a temporary visa. Life seemed perfect after she got married and brought her son over. However, she faces abuses of power from the officer in her green card process, who seeks to exploit her plight.

programme.title: Copperman
programme.desc: Anselmo, an adult with the mental age of a child, fights evil and the criminals who threaten his country as Copperman, thanks to the special armor given to him by the local blacksmith.

programme.title: Confetti
programme.desc: Due to her dyslexia, Meimei is ostracized by her school and community. Encouraged by Meimei's teacher from school, Lan leaves everything behind in China for New York City in hopes of finding an education program for her daughter.

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Director Jaze lost his mother to cancer in 2015. The Gift, inspired by his relationship with her, is an open letter from him to his mother.

programme.title: In Touch
programme.desc: What does perfection in a romantic relationship look like? Compatibility? Chemistry? Jon and Cheryl have both but there’s something still lacking. A deeply relevant and stirring snapshot of the peaks and troughs of young love.

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: Ragna Crimson - Instigation 克拉龍人拉格納 - EP3
programme.desc: Ragna and Crimson team up in Tortiere, aiding Michael's group against Disas Trois, a wind-wielding superior dragon, to save the city from annihilation.

programme.title: Staring into the Abyss
programme.desc: LKA officer David Wallat monitors released child murderer Joseph Maria Hagenow, now housed by a village pastor. As Hagenow manipulates his guards, a child’s disappearance threatens to unravel Wallat’s entire operation.

programme.title: Silenced Tree
programme.desc: Hayati is a small-town literature teacher and author who can’t move on from his past: his failing marriage, his sick mother, a decaying walnut tree, and memories of his father. When his wife’s body is found, the innocent Hayati confesses to the murder.

programme.title: Elaha
programme.desc: Elaha, a young Kurdish-German woman, battles patriarchy and family expectations while seeking her own path. Elaha struggles with traditions, marriage and virginity, and she must choose between emancipation or delusion.

programme.title: Lemonade
programme.desc: Mara, a young Romanian mother, is a caretaker in the US on a temporary visa. Life seemed perfect after she got married and brought her son over. However, she faces abuses of power from the officer in her green card process, who seeks to exploit her plight.

programme.title: Murder In Tours
programme.desc: A controversial sculptor is found murdered beside one of his artworks, which has been vandalized with Latin inscriptions. Commander Louise works with her son Sylvain to decode the crime; the clues lead them to disturbing truths about the artist’s works.

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Director Jaze lost his mother to cancer in 2015. The Gift, inspired by his relationship with her, is an open letter from him to his mother.

programme.title: In Touch
programme.desc: What does perfection in a romantic relationship look like? Compatibility? Chemistry? Jon and Cheryl have both but there’s something still lacking. A deeply relevant and stirring snapshot of the peaks and troughs of young love.

programme.title: Copperman
programme.desc: Anselmo, an adult with the mental age of a child, fights evil and the criminals who threaten his country as Copperman, thanks to the special armor given to him by the local blacksmith.

programme.title: Geranium
programme.desc: Just before her final exams, 19 years old Defne, must return to her hometown after her father's stroke. Although it is a perfect opportunity for her to heal their relationship, her trip back home inadvertently causes her to be sucked into family drama.

programme.title: Confetti
programme.desc: Due to her dyslexia, Meimei is ostracized by her school and community. Encouraged by Meimei's teacher from school, Lan leaves everything behind in China for New York City in hopes of finding an education program for her daughter.

programme.title: For A Moment, Forever
programme.desc: A young popstar overwhelmed by fame meets a troubled ex-rocker teaching music to adolescents at a therapy centre. Both longing for love, they get closer as affection for music connects them, but shall they overcome the burdens of his past?

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: The Key Witness
programme.desc: BKA bodyguard Jan Schäfer must protect Fiona Weibel, a key witness for the International Tribunal of the Law of the Sea. With Weiber having insider knowledge of a Swiss shipping company's illicit activities, a game of cat and mouse over her life begins.

programme.title: Sleepless Night (OTO)
programme.desc: A cop with a connection to the criminal underworld finds his secret life exposed when he and his partner are caught stealing cocaine from a powerful drug dealer, a move that puts his son's life in jeopardy.

programme.title: Europa
programme.desc: Kamal has fled Iraq to try to enter "Fortress Europe". At the Turkish-Bulgarian border, local mercenaries are ruthlessly hunting down migrants. Alone in the forest, Kamal has three days to escape.

programme.title: Cloud Under The Roof
programme.desc: Paul, Julia, and Lilly are a happy family, until Julia dies unexpectedly. For the sake of his daughter, Paul wants to function and suppress his grief. Lilly keeps challenging him with her imagination and her very own view of Mum's death.

programme.title: Let’s Celebrate 2025 - Part One
programme.desc: Get your party groove going with Tabitha Nauser, Haven, Estelle Fly, Alyph, Gareth Fernandez, Tosh Rock and more on Let’s Celebrate 2025: Part One! Themed `Let the Music Play’, the show is one entertaining hour of music and games, designed to be the perfect run-up to the main party piece. Join hosts Joakim Gomez and Munah Bagharib as they start the celebrations at 10 pm on 31 Dec 2024!

programme.title: Let’s Celebrate 2025 - Part Two
programme.desc: Kick off the New Year in style with Let’s Celebrate 2025, your countdown party by Mediacorp and the Singapore Sports Hub! With the theme `Let the Music Play’, we’ve jam-packed the line-up with top talents like Taufik Batisah, Shigga Shay, Regina Song, Tasha Low, Tosh Rock, Iman Fandi, and many more! The stroke of midnight signals a pulsating finale with a spectacular 15 minutes of fireworks, the longest single display islandwide. Join hosts Joakim Gomez and Munah Bagharib in ringing in 2025 and Singapore’s 60th year of nationhood!
